Name: Carnival of Rio
Description: The world's largest carnival celebration featuring parades and samba dancing.

Name: Oktoberfest
Description: The world's largest beer festival and travelling funfair.

Name: Diwali
Description: The festival of lights celebrating the victory of light over darkness.

Name: Chinese New Year
Description: Traditional celebration of the lunar new year with festivities and customs.

Name: La Tomatina
Description: The world's largest food fight festival using tomatoes.

Name: Holi
Description: The festival of colors celebrating the arrival of spring.

Name: Venice Carnival
Description: Historic carnival known for its elaborate masks and costumes.

Name: Day of the Dead
Description: A celebration honoring deceased loved ones with offerings and remembrance.

Name: Songkran
Description: Thai New Year water festival celebrating renewal and purification.

Name: Edinburgh Fringe
Description: The world's largest arts festival featuring thousands of performances.
